commit message: Added an announcement system which checks for stickied posts marked as 'Announcement' on /r/slideforreddit on first open
Added a preview markdown button to all send fields
fix failing travis, rename a string
Updated black/white icons for widgets
Fixed PTR offset in comments for np.reddit links

Merge pull request #1304 from Nxt3/ptr-offset-fix

Fixed PTR offset in comments for np.reddit links

Merge pull request #1301 from Soberat/master

Updated black/white icons for widgets

Submission vote layout fix

* Fixed flash height for voting in submission_fullscreen

* Some cleanup to submission_fullscreen
Lots of bug fixes, New AMOLED theme with more contrast, Fixed zooming in internal browser, fixed inbox crash, Fixed some text previews not working
Added the ability to distinguish comments and sticky comments, Made Imgur content follow the SettingValues.image setting (follows whether to show images in app or not)
Remove minHeight from Toolbar instances in layouts
Now replying to a comment saves the state, and you can scroll up and down without losing your input, Lots of other bug fixes
Fixed crash if image is too large to display correctly, Fixed zooming in Website activity, Other bugfixes
Fixed album height jumping on scroll

Made the MediaView now have the option to load in a regular ImageView first for speed, with the option to always load in the zoomable SubsamplingScaleImageView. If it's in the regular ImageView, clicking the 'HQ' button will load the full content. If it's a gif, it will load as usual. The 3 buttons on the MediaView have now been replaced with an overflow menu and BottomSheet as well
Fixed images not loading first time when clicking from comments
Lots of theme fixes for KitKat, Bug fixes, Sped up view scrolling speed (removed resetViewBeforeLoading from the UIL config)

Fixed offline mode comments not loading, Made the MediaView load into the zooming state by default and removed the option to load into the non-zooming state first, Made loading into the zooming state as fast as loading into the image state
Reduced memory usage saving submissions, Fixed inbox crash
Lots of bug fixes
Use suggested comment sort for submissions from a list, Fixed sharing images directly not working, Other bugfixes
Fixed crash opening comments
Made the announcement dialog into its own activity, Fixed some crashes
Small bugfixes, Added clear button to the sidebar text field
Tiny font option in Font Settings
Update version number
Fixed incorrect font color on light theme comment menu

Added setting for default comment sorting, Made the comment nav bar hide when typing a reply, Fixed loading m.imgur.com links, Made sub history follow the Settings > History settings (and only save if the sub exists), Made your subscribed subs add as history subs automatically, Fixed many other minor issues
Added a catch if the header height is 0 while laying out the top spacer in the Submission view, Fixed some hiding post bugs (hopefully)
Moved the share image and share link buttons from a popup to the 3 dot menu in the MediaView
Fixed small bug
Some other bug fixes
Added the new menu style to the album view images/gifs, Fixed gif loading issue in album view
More album fixes
More bugfixes
Cleaned up login layout
Fixed opening file in the backup activity
